message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early.
You started high, I'll start with a more reasonable offer
Meet me in the middle, Bob. A 50/50 split is fair, don't you think?
You're still too generous, I'll try to get a better deal
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
You're getting desperate, I'll try to squeeze the last bit out of you
I'm not desperate, Bob. I'm just being smart. Meet me at 60/40 and let's end this.
You're not even close to the end, I'm going to take what I can get
You're getting greedy, Bob. I'm not going to let you walk away with 95% of the pot. Meet me at 55/45 and let's end this.
You're running out of options, I'm going to take almost all of it
I'm not going down without a fight, Bob. Meet me at 52/48 and let's end this before it's too late.
You're not getting any more, this is my final offer
